title: How to Check for Updates for Windows 7

steps.headline: Open the Start  menu.
steps.description: This can be achieved by clicking the multicolored Windows 7 Start orb at the bottom-left of your screen.

steps.headline: Open Control Panel.
steps.description: Click Control Panel on the right column of Start.

steps.headline: Open Windows Update.
steps.description: Choose "Windows Update" from the middle of the list.

steps.headline: Check for updates.
steps.description:
Click the Check for updates button on the main screen. If you don't see the button, click the "Check for updates" link in the left pane. text:
Open the Start menu. This can be achieved by clicking the multicolored Windows 7 Start orb at the bottom-left of your screen. Open Control Panel. Click Control Panel on the right column of Start. Go to "System and Security". Click on the green header. Open Windows Update. Choose "Windows Update" from the middle of the list. Check for updates. Click the Check for updates button on the main screen. If you don't see the button, click the "Check for updates" link in the left pane. sentences: This can be achieved by clicking the multicolored Windows 7 Start orb at the bottom-left of your screen.
Click Control Panel on the right column of Start.
Choose "Windows Update" from the middle of the list.
Click the Check for updates button on the main screen.
If you don't see the button, click the "Check for updates" link in the left pane.
